text: I opredelikha za Allakh chast ot posevite i dobitŭka, koito Toĭ e sŭzdal, i rekokha: “Tova e za Allakh! - spored tyakhnoto tvŭrdenie. - A tova e za sŭdruzhavanite ot nas.” Ala tova, koeto be za sŭdruzhavanite ot tyakh, ne stigashe do Allakh, a tova, koeto be za Allakh, stigashe do sŭdruzhavanite ot tyakh. Kolko losho ot·sŭzhdat
